sniffer_js.inject_js: function sniffer() {  let videoTags = document.getElementsByTagName("video");  let jsonObj = {      "res_list":[]  };  console.log("video tags count:" + videoTags.length);  if (videoTags.length > 0) {    for (var i = 0; i < videoTags.length; i++) {      let url = videoTags[i].src;      console.log("video tag:" + url);      if (url != null && url.length > 0) {        let item = {            "url":url        }        jsonObj.res_list.push(item);      }    }    window.appInterface.onSnifferVideo(videoTags.length, urls);  } else {    window.appInterface.onSnifferVideo(0, urls);  }  console.log(jsonObj);}
